section.p: Shielded internal cable is recommended with two different approaches, that are:

li.p: Outer signal routing layers with EMI shielding film (silk screening with silver/ copper ink, aluminum/ copper film lamination).

section.p: Multiple ground pins/ contacts are required to connect the internal cable to PCB ground. Figures below illustrate some guidance on internal cable in reducing cable edge emission. Shielded connector may be considered.

fig.title: Internal Cable Guidance in Edge Emission Reduction

image.href: FIG_internal cable guidance in edge emission reduction_1.png
